summary: Comprehensive testing of ERP SaaS system completed. All major features working: Landing page with CMS content, Admin login/dashboard with all tabs, CMS editor, Module ordering flow, AI Chatbot (GPT integration), Public pages, Mobile responsive menu. 23/23 backend tests passed, all UI tests passed.

issues: Partner logo images show alt text 'Bedrijf A', 'Bedrijf B' etc. instead of actual logos - placeholder images not loaded

passed_tests: Backend: GET /api/public/landing/settings - returns company settings
Backend: GET /api/public/addons - returns available modules (Vastgoed Beheer, HRM)
Backend: GET /api/public/landing/sections - returns CMS sections
Backend: POST /api/auth/login - admin login works (admin@facturatie.sr)
Backend: POST /api/auth/login - invalid credentials rejected (401)
Backend: GET /api/auth/me - returns current user info
Backend: GET /api/admin/landing/sections - returns CMS sections for admin
Backend: PUT /api/admin/landing/sections/{id} - updates CMS section
Backend: POST /api/public/orders - creates order with account, returns JWT token
Backend: GET /api/admin/dashboard - returns dashboard stats
Backend: GET /api/admin/customers - returns customers list
Backend: GET /api/admin/addon-requests - returns pending addon requests
Backend: GET /api/admin/addons - returns addons for management
Backend: POST /api/chat - AI chatbot responds
Frontend: Landing page loads with CMS content (hero, features, stats)
Frontend: Navigation menu works (Home, Prijzen, Over Ons, Voorwaarden, Privacy)
Frontend: Login flow works - redirects admin to /app/admin
Frontend: Admin dashboard loads with all tabs (Klanten, Betalingen, Add-ons, Domeinen, Website)
Frontend: Website/CMS tab shows editable pages (Home, Prijzen, Over Ons, Voorwaarden, Privacy)
Frontend: Add-ons tab shows pending requests with Goedkeuren/Afwijzen buttons
Frontend: Public pages load: /prijzen, /over-ons, /voorwaarden, /privacy
Frontend: Module ordering flow - select module, open dialog, form with account creation
Frontend: AI Chatbot widget appears and responds in Dutch
Frontend: Mobile responsive menu works
action_items: Minor: Replace placeholder partner logos on landing page with actual company logos
seed_data_creation: Test orders created during testing with emails like test_order_*@example.com

landing_page_cms.description: Landing page loads with dynamic CMS content from getCmsSectionContent() helper

admin_login.description: Admin login with admin@facturatie.sr/admin123 redirects to /app/admin

cms_editor.description: Website tab shows editable pages with Bewerken/Preview buttons

module_ordering.description: Customer can select modules, open order dialog, create account with password

ai_chatbot.description: ChatWidget appears, responds in Dutch with relevant information about Facturatie.sr

mobile_responsive.description: Hamburger menu works on mobile, shows all navigation items

context_for_next_testing_agent: All major features tested and working. Key endpoints: POST /api/public/orders (creates user + addon requests + returns JWT), GET /api/admin/addon-requests (pending requests), PUT /api/admin/addon-requests/{id}/approve. Admin credentials: admin@facturatie.sr / admin123. CMS is managed via Website tab in admin dashboard. AI chatbot uses GPT-4o via emergentintegrations.llm.chat.
